attributes.action: Alter the driving age in Britain (lower it), whilst making the existing driving test more difficult, and introduce driving tests for 60+
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A 16 year old that is over the drink drive limit still has better reations than a 60 year old. Some may argue that younger drivers, particuarly males, are involved in more accidents but this all comes to experience. The younger they start to drive the mroe experience they'll get sooner. A more thorough driving test would also ensure only the better drivers get on the road
